title: LQP
body: So my internet died and i got 5 20 min queue and i waited 20 mins five times, i didnt play 5 games i just left the lobby after it was done. i somehow still have lpq so idk

replies.body: Ahh, the [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalty won't fall off without playing a game.  You'll have to wait through the timer and play a match fully to remove those games.  Let me know if that clears things up!
